casebody.data:
No. 404.

October Term; 1922.

Thomas D. McCarthy, United States Marshal for the Southern District of New York, v. Jules W. Arndstein. October 15, 1923. Mr. Solicitor General Beck, Mr. Lindley M. Garrison, Mr. Saul S. Myers and Mr. Walter H. Poliak, for appellant, in support of the petition.. Mr. W. Randolph Montgomery, by leave of Court, filed a brief as amicus curiae. [See 262 U. S. 355.]

The petition for a rehearing in this case is granted; and the case assigned for reargument on Monday, November 19 next, after the cases heretofore assigned for that day.
